sentences.sContent: He presses the bolt against a small hexagon tattooed on his forearm. The sizes match.
sentences.sContent_eng: He presses the bolt against a small hexagon tattooed on his forearm. The sizes match.
sentences.sCn: 他将螺钉与他前臂的一个小六边形纹身比了比，尺寸是一样的。

sentences.sContent: Various windows embellish the corridor, with the shape of square, circle, hexagon and octagon.
sentences.sContent_eng: Various windows embellish the corridor, with the shape of square, circle, hexagon and octagon.
sentences.sCn: 走廊的窗户形状各异，有方形，有圆形，有六角形，也有八角形。
